text:
11. 於亞洲國際博覽館範圍內嚴禁攜帶及使用違禁藥物。
12. 於亞洲國際博覽館範圍內嚴禁售賣或派發未獲授權的商品或其他物品。
13. 嚴禁攜帶及發放煙花、煙火、或使用激光儀器。
14. 不准攜帶及使用任何遙控飛行設備或玩具(如：模型直升機、無人駕駛飛機)。
15. 如觀眾感到不適或需要協助，請盡快通知現場醫療或保安人員。
16. 嚴禁炒賣門票。 門票如已被使用或轉售、分享予他人或作其他商業用途，亞洲國際博覽館管理有限公司及主辦機構將保留取消該門票之決定權。
trans:
11. Carrying and using illegal drugs is strictly prohibited within AsiaWorld-Expo.
12. The sale or distribution of unauthorized merchandise or other items is strictly prohibited within AsiaWorld-Expo.
13. Carrying and distributing fireworks, pyrotechnics, or using laser instruments is strictly prohibited.
14. Carrying or using any remote control flying equipment or toys (for example, model helicopters, drones) is not allowed.
15. If the audience feels unwell or needs assistance, please notify on-site medical or security personnel as soon as possible.
16. Ticket speculation is strictly prohibited. For tickets that have been used or resold, shared with others or used for other commercial purposes, AsiaWorld-Expo Management Co., Ltd. and the organizer reserve the right to cancel the tickets.
